actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have dogs, or to local governments which do not permit dogs in rental housing.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have dogs, or to local governments which do not permit dogs in rental housing. Permits the removal of any dog which constitutes a threat to the health or safety of the residents or neighbors of the housing project.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have dogs, or to local governments which do not permit dogs in rental housing.
